text:
Premise:
Inasmuch as there lacks an aerodrome on this exquisite isle, one must seek solace in the fact that the only port of entry is Skala, which furthermore is the primary location for hotels and commerce.

Hypothesis:
The most efficacious approach to reach the island would be via the majestic skies, courtesy of an airplane.
label: contradiction
orig_prem: Since there is no airport on the island, all visitors must arrive at the port, Skala, where most of the hotels are located and all commercial activity is carried out.
orig_hyp: The best way to get onto the island is by plane.

text:
Premise:
The emperor hath been oft a minor, thus the Fujiwara patriarch doth assume the role of regent.

Hypothesis:
At times, the emperor was in his youth, having not yet seen eighteen summers.
label: entailment
orig_prem: Very often the emperor was only a minor, so that the Fujiwara patriarch acted as regent.
orig_hyp: Sometimes the emperor was less than 18 years of age.

text:
Premise:
Verily, thou art aware that Arnold Schwarzenegger is becoming quite diverse an actor. In bygone days, he was known only for his bulging biceps, but now he endeavours to explore diverse roles.

Hypothesis:
Verily, mine eyes prefer Arnold Schwarzenegger as a thespian, rather than when he flexed his mighty sinews as a bodybuilder.
label: neutral
orig_prem: you know Arnold Schwarzenegger is getting to be uh a bit of a variety actor you know at first he was just a big muscle man but he's kind of branching out
orig_hyp: I prefer Arnold Schwarzenegger as a variety actor to when he was a muscle man.

text:
Premise:
Aye, apparently the appraisers be fancyin' it 'cause our taxes be as high as the crow's nest! Ain't it true, matey?

Hypothesis:
The appraiser did nae fancy it one bit.
label: contradiction
orig_prem: apparently apparently the appraisers likes it because our taxes sure is high  isn't it it really is
orig_hyp: The appraiser did not like it one bit.

text:
Premise:
This bidding to play the soothsayer is not a thing easily denied.

Hypothesis:
The calling to play the seer is not of easy denial.
label: entailment
orig_prem: This call to play fortuneteller is not easily refused.
orig_hyp: It's not easily refused the call to play fortuneteller.
